page.title: 14MAY WEEK SEAHOUSES
page.content: May Week, held in the first full week in May, was started in 1975 and is intended as "..a good all round week's entertainment for all the family." During the week, organised by Seahouses and District Chamber of Trade, a great variety of events are held catering for all ages and interests. Some of these are:- GOLF; FIVE-A-SIDE FOOTBALL Ladies,Men & Children; SIX-A-SIDE CRICKET; BADMINTON; CHILDREN'S SPORTS; ROUNDERS; NETBALL; WHIST & BRIDGE DRIVES; POOL; DOMINOES; DARTS; YARD-O-ALE; A CRAZY BOAT RACE in the harbour; MINI MARATHON; A number of DANCES; DISCOS and a CHILDREN'S FANCY DRESS COMPETITION
